item.title: MediaTek unveils Dimensity 8400, the first mid-range chipset with all big core design - The Indian Express
item.description:
MediaTek unveils Dimensity 8400, the first mid-range chipset with all big core design

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Indian Express

The new Dimensity 8400 chipset by MediaTek is set to make waves in the mid-range smartphone market. It features an all big core design, boasting 41% more multi-core performance while reducing energy consumption by 44% compared to its predecessor.

  • Powered by eight ARM Cortex-A725 cores at 3.25GHz.
  • Mali-G720 GPU offers a 24% performance boost while using 42% less power.
  • It includes innovations like Frame Rate Converter and Adaptive Gaming Technology 3.0 for enhanced gameplay.
  • The NPU 880 enables advanced processing for large language models and context-aware replies.
  • Dimensions support for camera sensors up to 320MP and features Imagiq 1080 14-bit HDR ISP.
  • First devices to feature this chipset, like Xiaomi's Redmi Turbo 4, will launch by year-end.
“The Dimensity 8400 chipset is designed to disrupt the mid-range smartphone segment.”

This release marks a significant step forward in mobile processing technology, emphasizing performance and efficiency for consumers.

item.title: Should chess players invest in their diet? - Sportstar
item.description:
Should Chess Players Invest in Their Diet?

Date: October 2023 | Source: The Hindu

Chess performance is closely tied to diet. The article explores how proper nutrition impacts focus, stamina, and mental clarity in chess players, debunking myths about calorie burning and emphasizing the importance of smart dietary choices for optimal performance.

  • High mental exertion can increase daily energy expenditure by 200-300 calories, not 6,000.
  • A proper diet can enhance memory and decision-making skills, crucial for chess.
  • Foods rich in Omega-3 fatty acids are vital for brain function.
  • Intermittent fasting and nootropic foods are emerging trends among cognitive athletes.
  • Genetic understanding may help players customize their diets for peak performance.
“The right diet could be your ultimate secret weapon.”

In conclusion, chess players can significantly benefit from focusing on their nutrition, as it directly influences their mental acuity and game performance.

item.title: Apple AirPods Pro 3 May Feature Heart-Rate Monitor, Temperature Sensor - Deccan Chronicle
item.description:
Apple AirPods Pro 3 May Feature Heart-Rate Monitor and Temperature Sensor

Publication Date: N/A Source: Mark Gurman's Power On newsletter

Apple is reportedly working on a variety of health features for AirPods, which is expected to roll out in the coming years.

  • Health features like a heart-rate monitor and temperature sensor are being developed for AirPods Pro 3.
  • The heart-rate monitor is the primary focus in internal testing, showing promise based on Apple Watch data.
  • Additional features may include tracking of physiological measures.
  • Apple is also reviving camera development for AirPods, which had previously been cancelled.
  • The development timeline for these features is expected to be a couple of years.
  • Recently, AirPods Pro 2 received a firmware update allowing them to be used as FDA-certified hearing aids.
“Apple is moving towards a health-oriented direction.”

This development indicates Apple's commitment to integrating health technology into its ecosystem, enhancing the functionality of its audio devices.

item.title: In 5 pictures: Real-life Iron Man suit could help paraplegic walk - India Today
item.description:
In 5 pictures: Real-life Iron Man suit could help paraplegic walk

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India Today

Researchers from South Korea's KAIST developed the WalkON Suit F1, a robotic exoskeleton that allows paraplegic users to walk, climb stairs, and navigate obstacles.

  • The WalkON Suit F1 weighs 50 kg and integrates 12 electronic motors.
  • It assists wheelchair users to stand and move.
  • Equipped with sensors and cameras, it analyzes surroundings for balance and navigation.
  • Paraplegic team member Kim Seung-hwan demonstrated its capabilities, winning in the Cybathlon 2024.
  • The project is inspired by Iron Man to enhance independence for individuals with disabilities.
“We aim to merge robotics with human lives to enhance independence for individuals with disabilities.” - Park Jeong-su

This innovative technology holds the potential to significantly improve mobility and quality of life for paraplegics.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 And Reno 13 Pro India Launch In January 2025: All You Need To Know - Times Now
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro Set to Launch in India in January 2025

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times Now

The Oppo Reno 13 series is confirmed to launch in India by the end of January 2025, featuring significant upgrades in design and camera setup.

  • The Reno 13 Pro will be available in Graphite Grey and Mist Lavender.
  • The Reno 13 will come in Ivory White and Luminous Blue.
  • Both models will feature a triple camera setup and an OLED display.
  • The Reno 13 Pro has a thickness of 7.55mm and weighs 195g, while the Reno 13 ranges between 7.24 to 7.29mm and weighs 181g.
  • Both phones are expected to be 5G capable and include premium features like IP66, IP68, and IP69 ratings.
  • The Reno 13 Pro will likely come with a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset, according to leaks.
“The Reno 13 series will sport a triple camera setup and a flat display.”

In conclusion, the Oppo Reno 13 series promises to bring advanced features and elegant designs to the smartphone market in early 2025.

item.title: Nothing Phone 3 Release Date, Price In India, Design, Specifications, Leaks, Everything You Need To Know - Times Now
item.description:
Nothing Phone 3 Release Date, Price In India, Design, Specifications, Leaks

Publication Date: N/A Source: Times Now

The Nothing Phone 3, expected to launch in 2025, aims to feature advanced AI capabilities, a transparent design, and powerful hardware.

  • Expected launch delayed to 2025 for advanced AI features integration.
  • Signature design with transparent back and LED light strips.
  • 6.67-inch LTPO AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 or Elite chipset, up to 12GB RAM.
  • Customisable action buttons inspired by iPhone.
  • Pro variant expected with higher-end specs.
  • Pricing: Pro above Rs 55,000, regular under Rs 50,000.
“customizable action buttons, which look to take inspiration from iPhone.”

The Nothing Phone 3 is poised to be a significant player in the mid-range smartphone market, leveraging its innovative design and features.

item.title: Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Samsung may introduce 'Slim' model in S25 series - Business Standard
item.description:
Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Samsung may introduce 'Slim' model in S25 series

Publication Date: January 2025 Source: 91mobiles

Samsung is set to unveil the Galaxy S25 series in January 2025, with potential plans for a new 'Slim' model coming later in the second quarter.

  • The Galaxy S25 Slim is expected to be only 6mm thick, compared to 7.6mm for the Galaxy S24.
  • The smartphone may offer a 6.66-inch display and a 4,700mAh battery.
  • It is likely to include a triple-camera system: a 200MP main sensor, a 50MP telephoto lens, and a 50MP ultra-wide lens.
  • The device may feature a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor.
  • It aims to compete directly with Apple's iPhone 17 Air.
“Samsung’s Galaxy S25 Slim could be a direct competitor to Apple’s thin-profile iPhone 17 Air.”

In summary, the Galaxy S25 Slim emphasizes a sleek design and competitive specifications, setting the stage for an interesting market battle with Apple's upcoming offerings.

item.title: WhatsApp to stop working on older phones, including some samsung Galaxy models, after December 31 - India TV News
item.description:
WhatsApp to Stop Working on Older Phones After December 31

Publication Date: December 23, 2024 | Source: India TV News

WhatsApp, with over two billion users, will discontinue support for several older smartphone models from January 1, 2025, impacting users primarily on older versions of Android.

  • More than 20 smartphones will lose access, primarily those running Android KitKat and earlier.
  • Brands affected include Samsung, LG, Motorola, HTC, and Sony.
  • Users will not receive updates, bug fixes, or security patches on these devices.
  • The change also affects other Meta platforms such as Facebook and Instagram.
“Older operating systems lack the necessary capabilities for advanced features and can present security vulnerabilities.”

Though WhatsApp will continue to function on these phones, the lack of support for updates raises security concerns for users with outdated devices.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 to launch in March 2025: Price, specs and more - India Today
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 to launch in March 2025: Price, specs and more

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: India Today

The iPhone SE 4, possibly rebranded as the iPhone 16e, is expected to launch in March 2025, featuring significant upgrades and a new design.

  • Possible rebranding to iPhone 16e, debuting as the fifth iPhone in the 16 series.
  • Expected to feature a 6.1-inch OLED display with improved visual quality.
  • Rear camera rumored to have a 48-megapixel capacity for better image quality.
  • Design anticipated to resemble the iPhone 14, with aluminum and glass aesthetics.
  • Powered by the A18 chip for enhanced performance and capabilities.
  • Likely to include up to 8GB of RAM for better multitasking.
  • Battery improvement to 3,279mAh, up from 2,018mAh in the SE 3.
  • Transition from Touch ID to Face ID for secure access.
  • Potential inclusion of an Action Button for customizable shortcuts.
  • Expected price range in India: Rs 51,000 to Rs 56,000.

item.title: OnePlus Ace 5, Ace 5 Pro With Key Features Spotted on TENAA Ahead of Launch - Gadgets 360
item.description:
OnePlus Ace 5, Ace 5 Pro With Key Features Spotted on TENAA

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Gadgets 360

The upcoming OnePlus Ace 5 series, which includes the Ace 5 and Ace 5 Pro, is set to launch in China. Key details regarding design, color options, and specifications have surfaced, confirming powerful Snapdragon chipsets and impressive display features.

  • The OnePlus Ace 5 will feature a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC and is expected to launch globally as OnePlus 13R.
  • The Ace 5 Pro will be equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor.
  • Both models will sport 6.78-inch AMOLED displays with 1.5K resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • The base model will house a 6,285mAh battery, while the Pro variant will have a dual-cell battery totaling 6,100mAh.
  • Both devices are likely to support fast charging at 80W and 100W respectively.
  • Camera specifications include a 50MP main camera and a 16MP front camera for both models.
"The Pro variant is said to have an IP65 rating for dust and water resistance."

In conclusion, the OnePlus Ace 5 series promises to deliver flagship features with robust specifications, appealing to both gaming and photography enthusiasts.

item.title: OPPO Reno 13 series will launch in India in January; design and colours confirmed - 91mobiles
item.description:
OPPO Reno 13 series India launch month, design, colours confirmed

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: 91mobiles

OPPO is preparing for the global launch of the Reno 13 series in January 2025, including in India. The Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro will feature distinct design elements and a variety of color options.

  • Launch scheduled for January 2025.
  • Reno 13 Pro will come in Graphite Grey and Mist Lavender, while Reno 13 will be available in Ivory White and Luminous Blue.
  • Graphite Grey and Luminous Blue have a matte finish; Ivory White and Mist Lavender have a glossy look.
  • Innovative design with grayscale exposure laser direct writing technique for the glossy finishes.
  • Luminous Blue variant features a glowing camera module.
  • Constructed with an aerospace-grade aluminium frame and a Gorilla Glass 7i front.
  • Reno 13 Pro has 93.8% screen-to-body ratio; Reno 13 has 93.4%.
  • Both models offer IP66, IP68, and IP69 water and dust resistance ratings.

Performance: The Reno 13 Pro recently scored 1301 in single-core and 3930 in multi-core on Geekbench, featuring Android 15 and MediaTek Dimensity 8350 processor.

item.title: Samsung workers fired over leak of upcoming Galaxy S25 Ultra phones’ images: Report - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Samsung Workers Fired Over Leak of Upcoming Galaxy S25 Ultra Phones’ Images

Publication Date: March 2024 | Source: CNBC-TV18

Several Samsung employees have been fired over the leak of images of the Samsung Galaxy S25+, according to a report by PhoneArena. The Galaxy S25 flagship lineup is expected to launch in January 2025, and amidst the hype, a prominent tipster leaked images leading to the firing of these employees.

  • The leak was associated with a post by tipster @Jukanlosreve showing purported images of the Galaxy S25+.
  • Samsung used device identification numbers traced from the leaked images to identify the employees responsible.
  • Samsung is preparing for the Galaxy Unpacked event, expected to reveal the S25 lineup.
“The Samsung invite hints at four different models, with the new entrant being the highly anticipated Galaxy S25 Slim.”

CNBC-TV18 has reached out to Samsung for comments regarding this development.

item.title: WhatsApp is soon getting this fun confetti celebration feature: How it works and when it will launch - HT Tech
item.description:
WhatsApp is soon getting this fun confetti celebration feature: How it works and when it will launch

Date: Not specified Source: Hindustan Times

The popular messaging app WhatsApp is testing a new confetti celebration feature that adds a festive animation when reacting to messages, enhancing user interactions during the holiday season.

Key Points:

  • WhatsApp is rolling out a confetti animation for specific emoji reactions.
  • The feature is currently available to a limited number of beta testers on both iOS and Android.
  • A full rollout is expected soon, aiming to coincide with the holiday celebrations.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

“WhatsApp will likely want users to enjoy this feature during this time as it certainly adds some spice and flair to your conversations.”

Stay tuned for further updates as more users get access to this playful feature.

item.title: Apple may bring AirDrop and AirPlay support to Android phones to comply with EU's new DMA draft - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Apple May Bring AirDrop and AirPlay Support to Android Phones Due to EU's DMA

Published: 23 December 2024, Source: Deccan Herald

Cupertino-based technology major Apple is expected to expand the availability of two Apple-exclusive features to third-party devices next year following new EU regulations.

  • Apple's AirDrop and AirPlay may soon be available on Android devices.
  • The European Union's new draft policy under the Digital Markets Act requires interoperability between devices.
  • This policy aims to decrease Apple’s exclusivity and enhance consumer choice.
  • Apple previously had to adopt a Type-C port for its devices and allowances for third-party app installations.
“It remains to be seen if Apple will comply with the EU's new DMA draft or take up any legal route to stall the new proposal.”

This update signifies a major shift in Apple's approach towards integrating its technologies with other platforms, potentially leading to greater interoperability in the tech industry.

item.title: Apple phasing out iPhone SE, iPhone 14, and iPhone 14 Plus in EU: Report - The Hindu
item.description:
Apple Phasing Out iPhone SE, iPhone 14, and iPhone 14 Plus in the EU

Date: December 23, 2024
Source: The Hindu

Apple is phasing out several iPhone models, including the iPhone SE, iPhone 14, and iPhone 14 Plus, in the European Union in response to new regulations requiring USB-C ports for wired charging.

  • The affected models were previously available on Apple’s online store in Switzerland.
  • This decision may expand to other EU countries soon.
  • Authorized resellers can continue selling their existing stock without disposal.
  • Apple often decommissions older models and ceases sales as part of its strategy.
  • India is also considering similar regulations for universal charging ports.
“Apple had warned this could affect local production numbers.”

In conclusion, Apple's shift to phase out certain iPhone models aligns with EU regulations, signaling a significant change in the charging standard for future devices.

item.title: WhatsApp is rolling out a new reaction emoji just in time for the New Year - BetaNews
item.description:
WhatsApp is rolling out a new reaction emoji just in time for the New Year

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: BetaNews

WhatsApp is enhancing user interaction by introducing a new reaction emoji, increasing the total to seven. This feature allows quick responses, making messaging effortless, especially during busy times like the New Year.

  • The new emoji is a party popper, perfect for celebrations.
  • Existing emoji include thumbs up, heart, crying with laughter, shocked, sad, and high five.
  • Additionally, sending certain emoji will trigger animated confetti in messages.
  • The update comes at a time when WhatsApp users are expected to communicate more frequently with friends and family.
"While certainly not a massive change to WhatsApp, it’s a nice bit of fun that has been delivered just time for one of the busiest periods for sending messages to friends and family."

This update, while not groundbreaking, adds a fun element to messaging during the New Year celebrations and enhances the user experience on the platform.

item.title: iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Pro are available with massive discounts - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Pro are selling at amazing discount offers. Here are all the details of the deals.

Published On: Dec 23, 2024

Published By: Aman Rashid

If you have been eyeing to buy the iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Pro, now would be a great time. The latest offers on the iPhone 15 series are not part of any ongoing sale but are available across different channels.

  • iPhone 15: Available for Rs 58,499, with a discount of Rs 11,401.
  • iPhone 15 Pro: Listed at Rs 97,690 after additional bank discounts, down from Rs 1,34,900.
  • EMI options available for both models starting at Rs 2,057 per month for iPhone 15 and Rs 4,955 per month for iPhone 15 Pro.
“The iPhone 15 Pro offers great value for money, especially for those looking to experience the iPhone Pro series without spending extra on the latest model.”

Both models maintain strong performance and features, making them worthwhile purchases despite the release of the newer iPhone 16.

item.title: What did India download on their iPhone? Most downloaded apps and games revealed - The Economic Times
item.description:
What did India download on their iPhone? Most downloaded apps and games revealed

Published Date: 2024
Source: Apple

As 2024 comes to an end, Apple has released data on the most downloaded games and applications in India from the App Store, highlighting popular trends among users.

  • Top Paid iPhone Games: Minecraft, Earn to Die 2, Hitman Sniper, among others.
  • Top Free iPhone Games: BATTLEGROUNDS MOBILE INDIA, Ludo King, Subway Surfers, and more.
  • Top Paid iPhone Apps: Forest, Money Manager, Procreate Pocket, etc.
  • Top Free iPhone Apps: WhatsApp, Instagram, YouTube, Google services, etc.
  • Shifts in Trends: An increase in the number of paid game purchases was noted.

Overall, this data underscores user preferences and changing purchasing behaviors in the digital space.
